name: Grinning Face
description: A big, open smile showing happiness and friendliness.

name: Face with Tears of Joy
description: Represents laughter to the point of crying; often used for something hilarious.

name: Red Heart
description: Symbolizes love, affection, or romantic feelings.

name: Smiling Face with Sunglasses
description: Represents being cool, confident, or carefree.

name: Dog Face
description: A cute dog’s face; often represents pets or puppies.

name: Red Apple
description: Symbol of health, knowledge, or temptation.

name: Glowing Star
description: Represents brilliance, success, or being special.

name: Party Popper
description: Used to celebrate or represent festive occasions.

name: Books
description: Symbolizes learning, education, or studying.

name: Globe Showing Europe-Africa
description: Represents the Earth, often used for topics about the world or travel.

name: Rocket
description: Represents space exploration, fast growth, or achievement.

name: Musical Note
description: Symbolizes music, rhythm, or sound.

name: Basketball
description: Represents sports, particularly basketball.

name: Fire
description: Symbolizes something awesome, intense, or on fire (literally or figuratively).

name: Airplane
description: Represents travel, vacations, or flying.

name: Clock Face Three O’Clock
description: Represents time, punctuality, or schedules.

name: Rainbow
description: Represents hope, positivity, or the LGBTQ+ community.

name: Cat Face
description: A cute cat’s face; often used to represent pets or cuteness.

name: Soccer Ball
description: Represents football (soccer) or sports in general.

name: Pizza Slice
description: Represents food, particularly pizza.
